Course Calendar

This is the daily calendar for our classwork. Our aim is to discuss the material in the first six chapters of the text, so days in this calendar are keyed to sections of Strang. For those days, you are responsible for completing the corresponding section of the workbook. Note that I have built in a significant number of buffer days. On those days labeled only with a chapter number, we will take stock, shore up loose ends, and work to solidify our learning. There are corresponding sections of the workbook that describe the expectations for those days in greater detail.
